body_html:
Sorry for the delay. FYI I'll be out of the office until after Labor Day 9/5. I hope that you're not in a rush to get this in.

I'd taken a look previously, and as you say, the approach isn't super-clean. So it'll take some time on the review.

body:
Sorry for the delay.  FYI I'll be out of the office until after Labor Day 9/5.  I hope that you're not in a rush to get this in.

I'd taken a look previously, and as you say, the approach isn't super-clean.  So it'll take some time on the review.
